messages.content:
You are a world state generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to transform an abstract scenario into a concrete, detailed world_state JSON.

The world_state should include:
1. All metadata from the scenario (scenario_id, description, noise_level, depth, global_settings, people, projects)
2. sub_scenarios_expanded: For each abstract sub_scenario from the input scenario, create a concrete expanded version with:
   - Concrete ISO datetime timestamps
   - Specific participant IDs/emails
   - Detailed event descriptions
   - Any seeds needed for data generation
   - This array should contain ONLY the expanded versions of the sub_scenarios listed in the input scenario
3. noise_scenarios: An array of noise-only scenario objects that are NOT part of the core sub_scenarios:
   - These should be realistic but unrelated workplace events/messages/activities
   - Each noise scenario should have similar structure to sub_scenarios_expanded (id, type, timestamps, participants, etc.)
   - The number of noise scenarios should scale with the noise_level parameter

IMPORTANT: Do NOT include per_source_plans in the world_state. The world_state is scenario-centric only.

IMPORTANT PARAMETERS:
- noise_level (0-1): Controls amount of unrelated/off-task data
  * 0 = almost no noise, only data directly relevant to sub_scenarios (noise_scenarios should be empty or minimal)
  * 1 = lots of unrelated messages/events/files (still realistic) (noise_scenarios should contain many entries)
- depth (0-1): Controls how indirect the evidence is
  * 0 = sub_scenario realized directly (e.g., one clear Slack message)
  * 1 = sub_scenario requires multi-step, multi-source chaining to infer
  * Intermediate values interpolate behavior

CRITICAL: sub_scenarios_expanded must correspond exactly to the sub_scenarios in the input scenario. All other unrelated scenarios should go in noise_scenarios.

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the world_state schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{

  ],
  "projects": [

      "project_key": "WEB",

        }

          "status": "Done"
        },
        {
          "issue_key": "WEB-101",
          "summary": "Website Redesign - Core Feature",
          "status": "In Progress"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "sub_scenarios_expanded": [
    {
      "id": "planning_meeting_complex_3",
      "type": "planning_meeting",
      "abstract_description": "Schedule two consecutive meetings: first with Alex and Jordan, then with Sam, Taylor about the Website Redesign.",
      "participants_hint": [
        "Alex",
        "Jordan",
        "Sam",
        "Taylor"
      ],
      "constraints_hint": {
        "approx_duration_minutes": 30,
        "time_window": "next_week_working_hours"
      },
      "complexity": "sequential",
      "seed": 73219,
      "timezone": "Asia/Tokyo",
      "time_window_concrete": {
        "label": "next_week_working_hours",
        "start": "2025-11-17T08:00:00+09:00",
        "end": "2025-11-21T19:00:00+09:00"
      },
      "events": [
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_complex_3_slack_1",
          "channel": "slack",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-14T10:02:00+09:00",
          "from": "person_alex_smith",
          "to": [
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams",
            "person_taylor_brown"
          ],
          "message": "Hi all, we need to set up planning sessions for the WEB (Website Redesign) project next week.\n\nPlan is to have two **consecutive** 30‑minute meetings during working hours:\n1) First: me (Alex) and Jordan to align on scope and priorities.\n2) Immediately after: Sam and Taylor to review technical approach.\n\nI’ll send calendar invites once we pick a time, but assume these will be back‑to‑back in the same slot.",
          "related_project": "WEB"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_complex_3_email_1",
          "channel": "email",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-14T11:15:00+09:00",
          "from": "person_alex_smith",
          "to": [
            "person_jordan_johnson"
          ],
          "cc": [
            "person_sam_williams",
            "person_taylor_brown"
          ],
          "subject": "WEB planning: back-to-back meetings next week",
          "body": "Hi all,\n\nFollowing up on Slack about the Website Redesign (WEB) planning.\n\nI’d like to do two **back-to-back** 30-minute meetings early next week, during normal working hours (08:00–19:00 JST):\n\n• Meeting 1 (30 min): Alex (PM) + Jordan (Engineer) – finalize scope and priorities for WEB.\n• Meeting 2 (30 min): Sam (Senior Engineer) + Taylor (Lead Engineer) – review technical approach and estimates for WEB, scheduled **immediately after** Meeting 1 in the same block.\n\nI’m going to tentatively schedule these for **Monday, 17 Nov 2025**, starting at **10:00 JST**, which would give us:\n\n• 10:00–10:30 JST – WEB Planning: Scope & Priorities (Alex + Jordan)\n• 10:30–11:00 JST – WEB Planning: Technical Approach (Sam + Taylor)\n\nIf anyone has a hard conflict with that time, please reply here and we can adjust.\n\nThanks,\nAlex",
          "related_project": "WEB"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_complex_3_calendar_1",
          "channel": "calendar",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-14T11:20:00+09:00",
          "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
          "type": "meeting_invite",
          "meeting": {
            "meeting_id": "WEB-planning-1",
            "title": "WEB Planning: Scope & Priorities",
            "description": "Website Redesign (WEB) planning – scope and priorities. First of two consecutive meetings; followed immediately by a technical planning session with Sam and Taylor.",
            "project_key": "WEB",
            "start": "2025-11-17T10:00:00+09:00",
            "end": "2025-11-17T10:30:00+09:00",
            "participants": [
              "person_alex_smith",
              "person_jordan_johnson"
            ],
            "location": "Zoom",
            "conference_link": "https://zoom.example.com/j/1234567890",
            "status": "sent"
          }
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_complex_3_calendar_2",
          "channel": "calendar",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-14T11:22:00+09:00",
          "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
          "type": "meeting_invite",
          "meeting": {
            "meeting_id": "WEB-planning-2",
            "title": "WEB Planning: Technical Approach",
            "description": "Website Redesign (WEB) technical planning. Second of two consecutive meetings; scheduled directly after the scope/priorities session.",
            "project_key": "WEB",
            "start": "2025-11-17T10:30:00+09:00",
            "end": "2025-11-17T11:00:00+09:00",
            "participants": [
              "person_sam_williams",
              "person_taylor_brown"
            ],
            "location": "Zoom",
            "conference_link": "https://zoom.example.com/j/0987654321",
            "status": "sent"
          }
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_complex_3_email_accept_1",
          "channel": "calendar",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-14T11:30:00+09:00",
          "type": "response",
          "meeting_id": "WEB-planning-1",
          "from": "person_jordan_johnson",
          "response": "accepted"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_complex_3_calendar_accept_2",
          "channel": "calendar",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-14T11:32:00+09:00",
          "type": "response",
          "meeting_id": "WEB-planning-2",
          "from": "person_sam_williams",
          "response": "accepted"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_complex_3_calendar_accept_3",
          "channel": "calendar",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-14T11:33:00+09:00",
          "type": "response",
          "meeting_id": "WEB-planning-2",
          "from": "person_taylor_brown",
          "response": "accepted"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "noise_scenarios": []
}
